short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Auto inject Javascript & Css by url rules, context menu, icon clicked, select text... support compare url by regular expression...

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension help to inject addition js/css for every webpage.
It can be use for developer to test web page.
add new functions to web page and more easy to use with injection rules.
